title: IT Engineer
job_overview:
Job Overview
We are a US-based Managed Service Provider (MSP) looking for a skilled and motivated IT Engineer to join our team. This role combines IT project implementation with day-to-day technical support responsibilities.

You will help maintain and improve our clients’ IT environments, troubleshoot issues, and contribute to IT projects. This is a great opportunity to grow your skills in a dynamic and supportive environment.

Key Responsibilities
*Assist with IT project planning and implementation.
*Provide Level 2 support for technical issues and escalate complex problems as needed.
*Troubleshoot and resolve hardware, software, and network issues.
*Perform PC maintenance, upgrades, and installations.
*Manage and support user equipment, software, and services remotely.
*Document work and update the ticketing system.

Technologies You’ll Work With
*Windows and Mac desktop operating systems
*Networking (e.g., Cisco, Ubiquiti, Fortinet).
*Microsoft 365 and Azure.
*Windows Server operating systems.

What We’re Looking For
*Strong troubleshooting skills for networks, servers, hardware, and software
*Familiarity with Microsoft 365, Windows Server, and networking concepts.
*Excellent communication and customer service skills.
*A proactive and problem-solving mindset.

Preferred but Not Required:
*Certifications like Network+, Microsoft Certified, or CCNA.
*Experience with firewalls, VPNs, and virtual environments.

Why Join Us?
*Be part of a forward thinking team with high growth potential.
*An open and collaborative environment where everyone enjoys what they do.
*Supportive environment and teammates.
*Paid certifications and training.
*Monthly Healthcare allowance.
*Performance based incentives (Monthly profit share and end of year bonus)
*13th month.
*Structured training and onboarding.
*Company provided work equipment.
*Remote work.

How to Apply
If you’re interested in this position, please submit your application and include the numbers (1881) somewhere in your subject line. This helps us ensure you’ve read the full job description.

Please attach your CV to your application or provide a link to your CV. Applications without a CV will not be considered.

The working hours for this role are from 4:30PM to 1:30AM CT Monday to Friday.

Please apply if you are interested in this position. We look forward to hearing from you.
